Question 40.Question: Please describe any differences in how it impacted your learning (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 40.Response: Gen AI may have a biased understanding of background information and requirements, resulting in inapplicable conclusions.

Question 41.Question: Were there any differences in how the feedback made you feel (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 41.Response: Gen AI will provide multiple solutions at the same time, but the teacher may directly give the most suitable solution.
